entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 6:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: S 20 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Snow mixed with rain overnight. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
